DOC.brief_title: An Global Comparative Observational Study RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year age Diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis Nonrespondent intolerant nonbiologic diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARD ) therapy Patient prescribe first biologic therapy 6 week prior inclusion visit , irrespective treatment prescribed Patients whose first biologic therapy give part clinical trial study rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) treatment Patients receive receive experimental DMARDs part clinical trial study RA treatment last 12 month Patients whose first biologic rituximab , abatacept anakinra . Patients receive biologic therapy 6 week prior inclusion visit
